Class DEProblem

java.lang.Object
si.ijs.kt.clus.util.tools.optimization.OptimizationProblem
si.ijs.kt.clus.util.tools.optimization.de.DEProblem
public class DEProblem extends OptimizationProblem
Class representing a Differential evolution optimization problem.
Author:
Tea Tusar, Timo Aho modified for multi target use 10.11.2008.
